public ref class SmtpPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制 Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) 伺服器的存取。

span.span: Controls access to Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和類別控制 SMTP 主機電腦的存取權。The and classes control access to SMTP host computers. 類別要求時傳送電子郵件傳遞的 SMTP 主機。The class demands an when sending electronic mail to the SMTP host for delivery. 列舉值會指定受此權限的執行個體的存取層級。The enumeration specifies the level of access controlled by an instance of this permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體。The following code example creates an instance of an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述這些主題說明在一般狀態的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立交集的現有權限授與的完整存取權的 SMTP 伺服器的物件權限物件。The following code example creates a permission object that is the intersection of an existing permission with an object that grants full access to SMTP servers. span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前權限是指定權限的子集，如果目前權限指定全部包含的指定權限的狀態。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示子集之間的關聯性兩個權限。The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions. summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 新的 使用權限，表示目前使用權限和指定使用權限的聯集。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回代表權限的所有狀態，表示目前權限和指定的權限。The method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個權限物件的聯集的權限物件。The following example creates a permission object that is the union of two permission objects.
